definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: With growth comes greater scrutiny, both by regulators and consumers.
sentences.chinese: 随着审查的更为严格，包括消费者和调查团。

sentences.english: Gaddafi also called on the UN to send fact-finding mission to Libya.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲还呼吁联合国派调查团到利比亚调查真相。

sentences.english: An inquiry has been ordered to ascertain the cause of the accident, ” said a defence media communiqué.
sentences.chinese: 已经成立一个调查团以确认事故原因。

sentences.english: The joint mission by the ROK side of 14 and 10 U. S. experts.
sentences.chinese: 联合调查团由14名韩方人员和10名美方专家组成。

sentences.english: Vice-Prime Minister Zhang Dejiang visited the crash scene today to help set up an investigation team.
sentences.chinese: 国务院副总理张德江今天率领调查团抵达事故现场。

definition: the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
foreign ministry (e.g. of Japan or Korea)
special detachment/commando/an armed secret agent squad
